verses.text: And when the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* was \w come|strong="H5060"\w*, and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add were\add* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H0622"\w* as \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

Then stood \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jozadak|strong="H3136"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shealtiel|strong="H7597"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* thereon, as \add it is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 3.2 \ft Jeshua: also called, Joshua\f*\f + \fr 3.2 \ft Zerubbabel: Gr. Zorobabel\f*\f + \fr 3.2 \ft Shealtiel: Gr. Salathiel\f*

And they \w set|strong="H3559"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* upon his \w bases|strong="H4350"\w*; for \w fear|strong="H0367"\w* \add was\add* upon them because of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of those \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*: and they \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* thereon unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add even\add* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* and \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

They \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* also the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w tabernacles|strong="H5521"\w*, as \add it is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w*, and \add offered\add* the \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* by \w number|strong="H4557"\w*, according to the \w custom|strong="H4941"\w*, as the \w duty|strong="H1697"\w* of every \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w required|strong="H3117"\w*;\f + \fr 3.4 \ft as the duty…: Heb. the matter of the day in his day\f*

And \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* \add offered\add* the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, both of the new \w moons|strong="H2320"\w*, and of all the set \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that were \w consecrated|strong="H6942"\w*, and of every one that willingly \w offered|strong="H5068"\w* a freewill \w offering|strong="H5071"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

From the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* they to \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. But the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was not \add yet\add* \w laid|strong="H3245"\w*.  +  r 3.6  t the foundation…: Heb. the temple of the \+nd LORD\+nd* was not yet founded *

They \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* also unto the \w masons|strong="H2672"\w*, and to the \w carpenters|strong="H2796"\w*; and \w meat|strong="H3978"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H4960"\w*, and \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, unto them of \w Zidon|strong="H6722"\w*, and to them of \w Tyre|strong="H6876"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* from \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* to the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* of \w Joppa|strong="H3305"\w*, according to the \w grant|strong="H7558"\w* that they had of \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*.\f + \fr 3.7 \ft carpenters: or, workmen\f*

¶ Now in the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of their \w coming|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, in the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w began|strong="H2490"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shealtiel|strong="H7597"\w*, and \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jozadak|strong="H3136"\w*, and the \w remnant|strong="H7605"\w* of their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and all they that were come \w out|strong="H0935"\w* of the \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w* unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; and \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, to set \w forward|strong="H5329"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Then \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w* \add with\add* his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w Kadmiel|strong="H6934"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w together|strong="H0259"\w*, to set \w forward|strong="H5329"\w* the \w workmen|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Henadad|strong="H2582"\w*, \add with\add* their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*.\f + \fr 3.9 \ft Judah: also called, Hodaviah\f*\f + \fr 3.9 \ft together: Heb. as one\f*

And when the \w builders|strong="H1129"\w* laid the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, they \w set|strong="H5975"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* in their \w apparel|strong="H3847"\w* with \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* with \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*, to \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, after the \w ordinance|strong="H3027"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And they sang together by \w course|strong="H6030"\w* in \w praising|strong="H1984"\w* and giving \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; because \add he is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* toward \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shouted|strong="H7321"\w* with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w shout|strong="H8643"\w*, when they \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, because the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was \w laid|strong="H3245"\w*.

But \w many|strong="H7227"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* and \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \add who were\add* ancient \w men|strong="H2205"\w*, that had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, when the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* of this \w house|strong="H1004"\w* was \w laid|strong="H3245"\w* before their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* with a \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*; and \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w shouted|strong="H8643"\w* \w aloud|strong="H7311"\w* for \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*:

So that the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* could not \w discern|strong="H5234"\w* the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w shout|strong="H8643"\w* of \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* from the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shouted|strong="H7321"\w* with a \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w shout|strong="H8643"\w*, and the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* was \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*.
